[You]1978-you ’re not alone . [We]1973-our ’re all here for [you]1978-you . [Austin]72-austin ’s road through alcoholism was brutal , and in the end , it all worked out . Unfortunately , that is n’t the case for [everyone]270-everyone . So , if [you]1978-you or someone [you]1978-you know is suffering from drug or alcohol abuse , please get [them]1989-them help .
